First, set up

```{r, Setup}
library(disdat)
source("MaxEntBayesFunctions.R")

PlotRegion <- function(reg, ncol=3) {
  spp <- unique(disPo(reg)$spid)
  par(mfrow=c(ceiling(length(spp)/ncol), ncol))
  sapply(spp, PlotMap, dataname=reg)
  
}

```

## AWT

```{r, AWT, fig.height=70}
#| results: hide
PlotRegion(reg="AWT", ncol=3)

```

